author: bnicholes
msg: Check for a NULL file name before trying to delete the file

author: joes
msg: ->upload(foo) is incorrectly blessed into Apache::Upload::Table instead of Apache::Upload

author: joes
msg: All APR::Table set-type methods (add(), merge(), etc) are unsafe
in our Apache::*::Table subclasses  These methods need to be
overridden to prevent segfaults within our C code, which treats
apr_table entries as being "promotable" to apreq_value_t,

author: joes
msg: mfd parser fails to parse CRLF-terminated files when the terminating
boundary string is at the start of a new bucket.  This is reportedly
a common event for PDF files uploaded with Netscape 7.
